citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45pm on
27-Oct-16. The inspector called the contact number listed for the license holder, knocked on the facility door, and
waited in the driveway for 1/2 an hour. No contact was made with the license holder.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45pm on
27-Oct-16.  The inspector called the contact number listed for the license holder, knocked on the facility door, and
waited in the driveway for 1/2 an hour.  No contact was made with the license holder.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
